item.title: E-Commerce: Are Open Digital Markets India's Next Big Thing?
item.description: Open Digital Markets: India’s Next Big Thing in E-Commerce? Open digital markets (ODMs) are a new way of organizing e-commerce that allows buyers and sellers to connect directly with each other without the need for a third-party platform. ODMs have the potential to revolutionize e-commerce in India by making it more affordable, accessible, and transparent for buyers and sellers.
